name: Fog
description: Dense fog reduces accuracy for all combatants by 10.

name: Rain
description: Slippery conditions. 1% chance to slip and miss your turn when attacking.

name: Blood Moon
description: Eerie red moonlight. 1% chance at turn start to heal a random combatant for 10 HP.

name: Lunar Eclipse
description: Mystical lunar energy. 1% chance at turn start to grant a random hero 4 ability experience.
